name: Notion Course Tracker
description: Track the courses you takeSort out your courses by status.Sort out the courses you take by topic/subject.See all the courses you take via the courses Gallery view.FAQsHow to get this product?Click the "I want this" button, open the template link, then click "Duplicate" on the top right corner of the Notion Template page to duplicate it to your workspace.For Inquiries & Suggestions.You can reach out to me anytime via this email, contact.johnseth@gmail.comCheers!
